select cms_post.id as postId, cms_post.title, cms_post.summary, cms_post.thumbnail, cms_post.status, cms_post.create_by, cms_post.create_time, cms_post.last_update_by, cms_post.last_update_time, cms_category.id as categoryId, cms_category.name as categoryName, cms_tag.id as tagId, cms_tag.name as tagName from cms_post left join cms_post_category on cms_post.id = cms_post_category.post_id and cms_post_category.deleted = 0 left join cms_category on cms_category.id = cms_post_category.category_id and cms_category.deleted = 0 left join cms_post_tag on cms_post_tag.post_id = cms_post.id and cms_post_tag.deleted = 0 left join cms_tag on cms_tag.id = cms_post_tag.tag_id and cms_tag.deleted = 0 where cms_post.deleted = 0
and cms_post.title like concat('%', #{condition.search}, '%')
order by cms_post.create_time desc
